text: The Girl who Dreams of Neon Seas is an anime with no voice. Told exclusively through music and visuals, the anime will follow a young DJ as she navigates her dual life as a college student by day and a vibrant performer by night.  #buildspace #nightsandweekends #S5 @_buildspace https://t.co/UN3xdzP4IK
